embedding.apiKey.label: API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for your embedding provider (or use ${ENV_VAR})

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Any embedding model name (e.g. nomic-embed-text-v2-moe, bge-large-en-v1.5)

embedding.baseUrl.label: Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Custom endpoint URL (Ollama, LM Studio, vLLM, or any OpenAI-compatible API). Supports ${ENV_VAR} syntax.

embedding.dimensions.label: Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Vector dimensions override for unlisted models (auto-detected for known models)

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context

captureMaxChars.label: Capture Max Chars
captureMaxChars.help: Maximum message length eligible for auto-capture
